title: The Fisherman
desc:
Post 573
- Instead of playing a card, players may ask another player if they have a certain card number in hand (the last number of their post number). If they do, the asker takes that card and they may continue their turn as normal. If not, the target player says "Go Fish", and the asker's turn is skipped.
- When a player has 4 cards of the same number, the Fisherman is removed. That player discards 10 cards.
